pkgmetadata.longdescription: # nnfsNeural Networks from ScratchFor use in conjunction with the book (https://nnfs.io) and the video series on YouTube (link to come later).At the moment, the main use is for the dataset generator:```pythonfrom nnfs.datasets import spiral_data_generator``` Have much more planned in the future... but just needed a quick way for people to get the dataset generator.
